characters module

class characters.Character(name)

Bases: object

Class for Characters in the game

Captain()

Makes the character Captain

Spy()

Makes the character Spy

idle(change=False)

Makes the character idle

walk(change=False, speed=0.3, displace=1)

Walks the character
